name: Shooting Gallery (itch) (Patrick Astermann)
description:
This is my Design Prototyping Assignment for my year 1 design course

Nothing special here just a little arcade carnival shooter!

If you play send me a screenshot of your highscore, and any feedback would be appreciated too! 

Thanks for playing

How to Install:

-Download ZIP file
-Extract Files
-Run ShootingGallery.exe in Folder 
-Enjoy
